Yes

E-commerce(useful general discussions about

Odoo:

 Magento

Subject: VoIP
Tryton: Support SIP and "Call To" URL widgets.

Subject: Website/CMS integration
Odoo: Yes Community integration: Joomla! CMS integration using JERA® Framework

Subject: Password Storage
Odoo: Cleartext by default, salted HMAC-MD5 hash with base_crypt module

Subject: Code review
Odoo: Bugfix/Feature branches reviewed by R&D on GitHub

Subject: float/integer representation
Tryton: Limited to float or long because using gtk.Entry without limit
Odoo: Limited to sys.maxint of Python because using gtk.SpinButton

Subject: Language
Odoo: Python (>=2.4) for 5.x series, Python (>=2.5) for 6.0, Python (>=2.6) for 6.1 and 7.x series

Subject: Version Policy
Tryton: No API changes in series, No XML change in series

Subject: Number of Modules
Odoo: 3800+ (220+ official ones bundled in the distribution)

Subject: Repository Organisation
Odoo: 1 repository for official modules, community modules in their author's repositories

Subject: Automatic Upgrades/Migrations
Odoo: Available for minor versions, under Maintenance Contract as services.

Subject: Python Module
Tryton: Server can be imported as Python module
Odoo: As of 6.1 series, server can be imported as Python module

Subject: Distribution Package
Tryton: Debian, Gentoo, Ubuntu, Arch Linux, Fedora, Foresight Linux, Windows (only client), OS X (only client), OpenBSD, OpenSUSE
Odoo: Debian (no longer maintained), Ubuntu, Windows, OS X (community packaging), plus generic .deb and tarball, Fedora

Subject: Desktop Clients
Odoo:
GTK Based Desktop Client (up to version 6.1)
 KDE/QT Client (Community, up to version 5)

Subject: Web based Clients
Tryton: Based on jQuery and Bootstrap (work in progress)
Odoo:
5.0 series: official web client based on CherryPy, Mako and Mochikit
 6.0 series: official web client (partially rewritten) based on CherryPy, Mako and JQuery
 6.1 series: official web client (rewritten from scratch) based on HTML5, JQuery and Dhtmlx

Subject: Reporting Engines
Tryton: Relatorio based Openoffice WYSIWYG reports or any custom, JasperReports (Community)
Odoo: RML-based (official), Webkit based (official), Aeroo Reports — WYSIWYG HTML/Openoffice reports, Relatorio based (Community), JasperReports (Community), MAKO (work in progress), PDF forms (in progress), Pentaho Report Designer (Community)

Subject: Unit testing
Tryton: Covers server, proteus, client and all modules
Odoo: Covers official server, modules and reports

Subject: Functional Testing
Odoo: Official YAML based tests in 6.x series, OERPScenario based (Community)

Subject: Translations
Odoo: translation teams assigned for 30 languages, but not all 100% translated
